name: Happy Covidween
description: A mobile endless runner. You play as a witch flying with your broom through the woods to run away from the Corona Virus Monster while simultaneously dodging obstacles and saving the local ghosts by zapping them with your magic wand to conjure masks on them. You will also need to collect hand sanitizers, a newly discovered potion by the head witch. She had tasked you to throw it to the virus monster to cleanse it.
